title: Here comes the punch line poster!!
body:
Just want to show my poster that I made in a Visual Communication and Design assignment. It features Vi on stage telling a joke and the title being "here comes the punch line" (if you don't know that's one of Vi's quotes). 


P.S: I have 1349 RP and I really want to buy the new project Leona (yess finally a good leona skin :D) but lack the 1 rp :(

replies.body: hahaha nice.. That's real sad about the 1RP though. I'd buy the smallest amount you can using phone credit honestly then get it :)
